mapper.select: select c.cou_code, c.cou_name, crg.COMPLETION_STATUS, EXAM_STATUS, crg.crg_code, TRUNC(REGISTRATIONDATE + COU_PERIOD - SYSDATE) AS remainingperiod from COURSES c, COURSE_REGISTRATION crg , EXAM_PARTICIPATION ep where crg.ui_id = #{userId} and c.cou_code = ep.cou_code and c.cou_code = crg.cou_code
